price: (26) And give the relative his right, and [also] the poor and the traveler, and do not spend wastefully.[737]
arabic: وَءَاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَلَا تُبَذِّرۡ تَبۡذِيرًا
footnotes: [737]- i.e., on that which is unlawful or in disobedience to Allāh.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waāti dhā al-qur'bā ḥaqqahu wal-mis'kīna wa-ib'na al-sabīli walā tubadhir tabdhīran
